com.rockagen.malen.connector

Class ApplicationDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockagen.malen.connector.ApplicationDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.RequestDispatcher

    public class ApplicationDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.RequestDispatcher
    RequestDispatcher implements class

    First, get the request uri,then Analyze the contentType

    If the above conditions is right,call #doFilter(ServletRequest, ServletResponse, FilterChain)

    The "throw new MalenDispatcherException()" is a hook,because,if servlet call forward,the servlet method after forward is trashy,these
    can't be call !

    if this forward is over ,ok, connection is over the more infomation see #process(HttpRequest, HttpResponse) InvocationTargetException

    Author:
    AGEN
